text: Jishu Dasgupta (3 September 1956Times Of India Obituary - 21 December 2012) was an Indian Bengali television director and actor. After suffering from cancer for nine months, he died on 21 December 2012 in a hospital in Kolkata. == References == Category:People from Khulna Division Category:1956 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Indian actors Category:Indian television directors
title: Jishu Dasgupta
